title: Emerald and Diamond Bridal Kasulaperu Haaram - A Timeless Elegance
materials: G Color). Features Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: This exquisite Haaram features a contemporary take on the traditional Kasulaperu design. The neckline is adorned with intricately carved gold bars and alternating diamond-encrusted floral pendants with emerald accents. The central pendant showcases a grand peacock design (Mayura aakruti), meticulously set with diamonds surrounding a stunning emerald center. Delicate gold bead danglers (gundla pothalu) add a touch of traditional charm. Features a hidden clasp for a seamless look.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Can also elevate a sophisticated evening look.
description: A stunning blend of tradition and modern design. The brilliant-cut diamonds create unparalleled sparkle, while the vibrant emeralds add a regal touch. Crafted with meticulous detail by skilled artisans, this piece is an heirloom to be treasured for generations. Its timeless design makes it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine and beauty.
